DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 60 year . Subjects must good general health history physical exam . Five subject 9 15 month past bariatric surgery ( RouxenY procedure ) , BMI requirement . Five subject match body mass index , age sex post bariatric surgery group . No contraindication receive single dose 100 mg sertraline . Women child bear potential must practice accepted method birth control ( barrier method oral contraception ) negative pregnancy test baseline . Allergy sertraline constituent . Candidates currently receive sertraline antidepressant . Candidates currently receive medication interacts sertraline ( Zoloft ) Candidates poor metabolizers CYP2D6 and/or 2C19 enzyme . Candidates experience clinically significant , unstable neurological , hepatic , renal cardiovascular disease . Candidates currently past history meeting DSMIV diagnostic criterion schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder . Candidates participate investigational drug study past 30 day . Candidates meet DSMIV diagnostic criterion drug/alcohol abuse dependency history drug/alcohol abuse dependency . Candidates pregnant nursing time study .
